mapper.select: SELECT t2.org_id, (select x.org_name from sys_authz_org_list x where x.org_id = t2.org_id) as org_name, t.dept_id, t2.dept_name, t.team_id, t.team_name, t.team_intro, t.team_uid, t.team_status, t.time24 FROM sys_authz_org_team t inner join sys_authz_org_dept t2 on t2.dept_id = t.dept_id WHERE t.team_id = #{id}

SELECT t2.org_id, (select x.org_name from sys_authz_org_list x where x.org_id = t2.org_id) as org_name, t.dept_id, t2.dept_name, t.team_id, t.team_name, t.team_intro, t.team_uid, t.team_status, t.time24 FROM sys_authz_org_team t inner join sys_authz_org_dept t2 on t2.dept_id = t.dept_id
WHERE t.team_id = #{key}

SELECT t.team_id,t.team_name FROM sys_authz_org_team t WHERE t.team_status = 1
AND t.dept_id = #{key}
